Events that occurred on 21 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1944 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 70.
1951 - Artist Angelo Montanini is born.
2000 – The message-board Minastirith.com goes online.
2011 – Unquendor's Lustrumfeest.
2011 – The Tolkien Society's Middle-earth Weekend in Sarehole, Birmingham.
2013 - The Fall of Arthur is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: The are no known events for this day.
